message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle.
Come on, Alice, it's time to be realistic about the value of this money. Inflation is eating away at it!
Look, Bob, we're both losing money with each round. Let's just split it evenly and stop this back and forth. We can both get something instead of nothing.
